summary: An answer to a mod request to "remove those pesky flecks" in Sovngarde.  It only removes the ambient snowflake FX.
descriptionHtml:
A request was made by cradleofgod on the Nexus to "remove those pesky flecks" in Sovngarde.  This mod disables the ambient snow FX that include actual snowflakes; none of the rest are touched.
Should be fully compatible as the only edits are minor changes and they are disabled, not deleted.  Only Skyrim.esm is required to run the mod.

Credit goes to cradleofgod for the concept of the mod.
author: Lyss
